com.team09.qanda

Class ThreadListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.team09.qanda.ThreadListAdapter

  • public class ThreadListAdapter
extends <any>
    This is a custom adapter for displaying a list of questions. It is used in the MainActivity for the main list of questions and in the UserThreadsActivity to display locally stored questions with a few changes. This class extends ArrayAdapter and uses an ArrayList of QuestionThread objects to display the summary of a list of questions using a custom layout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadListAdapter(Context context, int layoutResourceId, java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> threads, boolean isMain)
      The constructor takes the context of the activity using the adapter, the resource id of the custom row layout and the QuestionThread objects to be displayed in the form of an array list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadListAdapter

        public ThreadListAdapter(Context context,
                         int layoutResourceId,
                         java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> threads,
                         boolean isMain)
        The constructor takes the context of the activity using the adapter, the resource id of the custom row layout and the QuestionThread objects to be displayed in the form of an array list.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the activity where the adapter is being used
        layoutResourceId - The resource id for the custom row layout that is to be used
        threads - The list of question threads whose summary is to be displayed
        isMain - A boolean to identify if the adapter is being used in the main activity or not

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
        Returns a View that displays a row in the list of questions' summary It inflates a custom layout that consists of various text views to display the summary of a question. It grabs all the information (text, author, location, number of points, and the number of answers) from the QuestionThread object at the index in the threads ArrayList that the current position in the list corresponds to. This method also implements onClickListeners for the button that is used to save questions for later.
        Parameters:
        position - The index of the row in the list being displayed
        convertView - View used in the previous row
        parent - The parent that this view will be attached to
